itunes:title: Exodus Week 4 with Blair Linne
title: Exodus Week 4 with Blair Linne
description:
Join us for the fourth week of Exodus as Raechel and Amanda sit down with author, speaker, actress, and spoken word artist, Blair Linne. From the tent to the priestly garments, the details of the Lord’s glory and beauty are interwoven throughout each passage. Together, they marvel at the magnificence of God, who is not only the Creator, but also the ultimate architect, designer, and craftsman—seen throughout the detailed plans for His people in the book of Exodus as they prepare a place to dwell in His presence. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Exodus reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Exodus collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/exodus-week-4-with-blair-linne
